entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
